JSONSchema for render.yaml

Beware. There might be bugs, but it serves me well at the moment. Take a look at the full spec on render.com. If you find any problems feel free to first open an issue.

Usage in VSCode

  1. You need to install and enable the YAML extension redhat.vscode-yaml
  2. You need to add the url of the schema to your settings.json like this:
    {
  "https://render-com-iac-yaml-schema.onrender.com/render.com.json": ["render.yaml"]
}
  3. Reload your window
  4. Let's go
